H0.text: Levi Stubbs was the lead singer of which 'Motown' group from 1953 until 2000. The Temptations

H1.text: Levi Stubbs was the lead singer of which 'Motown' group from 1953 until 2000. The Supremes

H2.text: Levi Stubbs was the lead singer of which 'Motown' group from 1953 until 2000. The Jackson 5

H3.text: Levi Stubbs was the lead singer of which 'Motown' group from 1953 until 2000. 4 Tops

A4.text: Levi Stubbs was the lead vocalist of the Four Tops, a Motown group, from their formation in 1954 until his death in 2008.

A5.text: The Four Tops signed with Motown Records in 1963.
